allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Weather XML API Dashboard

- Implemented complete weather data to XML conversion flow
- Created Express backend server with API endpoints
- Built React frontend with modern UI components
- Added temperature fetching from Open-Meteo API
- Integrated sunrise/sunset data from Sunrise-Sunset API
- Implemented JSON to XML conversion utility
- Added location input with preset cities
- Created weather card display component
- Built XML viewer with syntax highlighting
- Included copy and download functionality
- Added comprehensive documentation

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
